title: Wordle Clone
description: Recreation of the popular web game Wordle. In this project I learned to utilize localstorage for storing wins and losses for returning users. I then learned to use eventListeners for key inputs to allow users to use keyboard strokes instead of clicking on the keyboard.

title: TFT-Forge
description: TFT-Forge is made to be a social platform for users playing the game Team Fight Tactics. It allows users to find optimal builds and find current metas.

title: Websockets with Go
description: Learning to use go and create websockets to connect to my react frontend.

title: complib-ui
description: Complib-ui is was a simple project of mine to create a component library and publish it to npm. Creating component libraries internally is common these days. Creating this helped me learn to use Story book and write react-ui tests.
